references.paper_title: Learning to generalize from sparse and underspecified rewards
references.reason: This paper is relevant as it deals with generalization from sparse rewards, a challenge also addressed in the current paper.
This is relevant because the paper frames optimizing test-time compute as a meta-reinforcement learning problem.

references.paper_title: Model-agnostic meta-learning for fast adaptation of deep networks
references.reason: This paper details Model-Agnostic Meta-Learning (MAML), used to enhance generalizability of the learning agent.

references.paper_title: Deepseek-r1: Incentivizing reasoning capability in llms via reinforcement learning
references.reason: DeepSeek-R1 is a state-of-the-art model that incorporates reinforcement learning in reasoning, a key comparison point for the current work.
This paper details TRPO, a foundational reinforcement learning algorithm used to optimize policies.
